level.text: Student travel shall be restricted in accordance with the following:
On Saturdays and Sundays throughout the calendar year;
On other dates, as determined by the Director of Public Works.
Metrobus operators shall not accept the regular metallic student bus tokens during the periods cited in this section.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is the School Transit Subsidy Act of 1978, D.C. Law 2-152, D.C. Code ยง44-216 et seq. (1981 Ed.).
